overview: Shattered mind, shattered images, shattered culture. Fragmented messages bombard us from all directions, like a barrage of letters from every corner of the globe. Should the artist "hold the mirror ball" up to nature, and mesmerize the populace with fractured distractions? Is our decentralized culture doomed to incoherence? Or can the artist build new meanings through the technique of collage? Based on an improvisation.
tagline: An examination of the fractured nature of contemporary thought, and the possibility of using collage to create a new coherence.
title: Epistolary Fusillades
